tooltips.toogle-cubic.en: Toggle between cubic and linear ease

dialog-messages.new-ease.desc.zh: 自定义曲线 [b]{0}[/b] 已添加到项目的内置曲线列表中。
dialog-messages.new-ease.desc.en: A new custom ease with the name [b]{0}[/b] will be added to the project as a result of editing a built-in ease.

dialog-messages.default-ease.desc.zh: 当前选择的时间轴元素 '[b]{0}[/b]' 正在使用 '[b]{1}[/b]' 曲线，此更改将应用于 `[b]{2}[/b]`, 它是作为第一个具有自定义曲线值的元素。
dialog-messages.default-ease.desc.en: The selected timeline element, '[b]{0}[/b]', is using the '[b]{1}[/b]' ease. For this reason, changes made will be applied to `[b]{2}[/b]`, which is the first element with a concrete ease value.
